channel.title: CVE Feed for baserCMS Users Community -- baserCMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for baserCMS Users Community -- baserCMS

item.title: CVE-2022-42486|2024-08-03T13:10:40.919Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in User group management of baserCMS versions prior to 4.7.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2022-41994|2024-08-03T12:56:39.236Z -- basercms%20users%20community -- basercms
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in Permission Settings of baserCMS versions prior to 4.7.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to inject an arbitrary script.
